summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to environmental protection amending Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 25.05, Environmental Policies and Procedures, to implement the City's Environmentally Critical Areas Policies, amending Section 25.05.675, Specific Environmental Policies, Section 25.05.748, Definition for Environmentally Sensitive Area, Section 25.05.800, Categorical Exemptions, and 25.05.908, Environmentally Sensitive Areas; and adding Section 25.05.747, Definition for Environmentally Critical Area.
note: Amendments to environmentally critical areas ordinance.
